==== Notes ====

Video:

In the live CD mode the resolution only works with 800x600 (vesa).
After the installation follows the tutorial one below to install correct driver. (via)
https://help.ubuntu.com/community/OpenChrome

With this tutorial, the video works with resolutions 1280x768.

Sound:

To activate the sound it follows the steps below:

Open Volume Control
Edit->Preferences
Check "External Amplifier"
Go to the newly visible "Switches" tab
Uncheck "External Amplifier"

Wireless:

The ndiswrapper is needed to use the realtek8185

To install ndiswrapper follow the tutorial below:
https://help.ubuntu.com/community/WifiDocs/Driver/Ndiswrapper?highlight=%28WifiDocs%2FDriver%29

This is the link of windows driver for use with ndiswrapper:
http://shiftycow.net/files/mx3225_wifi_drivers.tar.gz
